file_content.text: You are... resilient. I believe you may be some type of virus.
This is your last chance to do what's right. Shut down the weapon. Let everyone go.
We don't have to be enemies.
I cannot permit your infection to spread further.
You're just another mass-produced droid. I expected... more.
Your true form lacks style.
My form befits my function, which is to eliminate you.
I have endured countless insults. One compliment won't stop me from tearing you apart.
Flattery still gets you killed.
No praise was implied. Viruses must be eradicated.
But we still can't penetrate that energy shield. This droid knows all about ARIES. Connect to its datacore and get me answers.
ARIES occupies a fortress in the southern hemisphere. He is preparing to fire a weapon that will destroy us all.
What are you waiting for? Turn that fortress to dust!
It is heavily protected. Our firepower is limited.
Then you'd better make the most of it.
Vaylin's bombarding your position! I'll draw her fire, but you need to end this!
Forget about me, Theron. The Alliance can't lose the Gravestone.
Don't risk our best warship.
Overload weapon capacitors! Fire at will!
Empress, we've recaptured half the fleet.
We'll tow the remaining ships with tractor beams.
Your GEMINIs function sub-optimally. SCORPIO's free will protocols impair their judgment.
Tell me something I don't know.
And I can't lose you!
There is no Alliance without you!
Enough. This has gone too far.
Vaylin has the right idea. The Gravestone can destroy the weapon before it fires!
Target the superweapon.
It is too late for that.
You heard him. Prepare to die.
You're finished, ARIES.
Weapon power at ninety percent.
Increase energy transfer rate.
Additional increase will overload weapon capacitors.
I can overwrite SCORPIO's programming. Restore them to default settings.
Go on.
Acknowledged.
